overview:
Jordan Kretchmer is the founder and CEO of Livefyre. Livefyre brings the social web experience to both blogger and publisher sites by creating conversations around original content and curated content from across the social web.

Kretchmer founded the San Francisco based startup in December 2009, and has overseen its growth to the 32nd largest online network in the US.

Before launching Livefyre, he was the Vice President of Brand at Current TV where he led brand redevelopment for the media company. Previously, he served in a variety of senior creative and art director roles at Mullen Advertising, Butler Shine, Stern & Partners, and Tribal DDB.

Kretchmer lives in San Francisco.
